name: The Giant's Visit
description:
In a world of Preludia, the home of Preludian species, a travelling giant named Felix reaches the coast when he finds a green island in a horizon! Filled with curiosity, he swims to the location, only to discover that the residents of this place have hidden in the shelter! What made them go there? And what unexpected characters shall the giant encounter? There is only one way to find out... and that is to play this game!

The Giant's Visit is adventure game and a remake of my other project: "It's a Giant". The game where you explore the island as a giant blue Preludian, that is powerful enough to make a lot of damage. It's up to you how this adventure will end for Felix!

FEATURES:

  • Preludians of many types.
  • A small island to explore freely.
  • Professionally hand-drawn colourful graphics.
  • Fully destructible environment.
  • Mushrooms.
  • Achievement system! Unlock new portraits while playing the game.
  • Non linear gameplay, with 3 endings!
  • A female character to save.
  • A scene in which the giant outgrows the planet.
  • And whatever else I forgot to mention. (If there is anything...)

Controls:

Hope you like it! If there is a problem with the game or you struggle with something, then let me know!
